long_description:
Sapiens are humanoid creatures that, despite appearing masculine, are genderless. They come out of eggs(???) and produce items based off of their "occupation".

Sapiens organize themselves into tribes, these tribes appear to function similarly to that of the colonies of eusocial species like naked mole rats and ants.
name: mobkit_sapien
short_description: Adds villager like mobs using Mobkit.
title: Mobkit Sapien
